name: High-Flow Shear Mismatch Factor (M_?*)
functionStatement: Peak-flow velocity/shear is consistent with bed and bank resistance.
descriptionMarkdown: Same mismatch factor concept applied to bankfull/high-flow condition; lower is better.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Compute ?* at bankfull/high-flow design stage; compute mismatch factor relative to ?*crit.

inputs.label: High-Flow Shear Mismatch Factor (M_?*)
inputs.helpMarkdown: Modeled or estimated bankfull hydraulics (R,S) and D50; optional HEC-RAS.

stratifications.name: Proposed (derived from SFARI rapid curves) - Compute by representative cross-sections; stratify by stream type and bank strength.
